word_mean: 耐酸的，抗酸的：指染色后不能被酸立即脱色，这是某些细菌，特别是结核杆菌、麻风杆菌和一些诺卡氏菌的特征

sentence.Network_en: The positive rate of acid - fast bacillus was 0.6 % ( 1 case ), of L - forms was 60 % ( 93 cases ).

sentence.Network_en: Nevertheless, only 11 cases ( 6 29 % ) presented positive acid fast stain.
sentence.Network_cn: 而抗酸染色阳性仅有11例. 占 629%.

sentence.Network_en: Microscopically, Mycobacterium avium - intracellulare infection is marked by numerous acid fast organisms growing within macrophages.
